articles.description: The consolidation is a brief pause in the overall uptrend, and we expect the up move to resume during the coming week, says Jatin Gedia – Technical Research Analyst at Sharekhan by BNP Paribas.

articles.title: OpenAI announces new board members, reinstates CEO Sam Altman - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has announced new additions to its board of directors, including CEO Sam Altman, who lost his seat in a power struggle months ago.
articles.content:
Sam Altman, the CEO of OpenAI, has a seat at the table — or board, rather — once again.

articles.title: Fortnite's new season is delayed due to tech issues - Engadget
articles.description: Epic Games has delayed the start of the new Fortnite season due to a technical issue. The latest season focuses on Greek gods.

articles.title: NASA's Network of Small Moon-Bound Rovers Is Ready to Roll - NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory
articles.description: Construction and testing are complete on the CADRE rovers, which will map the lunar surface together as a tech demo to show the promise of multirobot missions.
articles.content:
The project conducted several drives at night under large flood lamps so the rovers could experience extreme shadows and lighting that approximate what theyll encounter during the lunar daytime.
